articles.title: 'It's hitting leg stump - Bairstow should have been out first ball!'
articles.description: England's Jonny Bairstow survives a first-ball scare as Sri Lanka choose not to review a potential lbw that was going on to hit the stumps during their Cricket World Cup game in Bangalore.
articles.content:
England's Jonny Bairstow survives a first-ball scare as Sri Lanka choose not to review a potential lbw that was going on to hit the stumps during their Cricket World Cup game in Bangalore.

articles.title: England face Sri Lanka in crucial World Cup match - clips, radio & text
articles.description: Follow live text, in-play video clips and radio commentary as England play Sri Lanka in the Men's Cricket World Cup 2023.
articles.content:
England captain Jos Buttler: "We've done enough talking, it is about performing today and if we play to our potential we know we are a good team.

articles.title: PCB hands Umar Akmal three-year ban from all cricket | ESPNcricinfo.com

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
